description:
Summary
=======

- To provide the support for adding new compute node through templates.

Motivation
==========

- While woking on multi-node network, when we need more computation power, it is difficult to add compute node. Always we have to do it manually. So we wish to provide a mechanism so that we can do it through templates that we can run from controller without manual intevention of the user.

Description
===========

- A new feature will be added in horizon which will allow to add a new compute node through templates from controller.
title: Support for addition of compute node into the running environment
